lines.text: Do I have anything to toss him through that thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it takes your whole-- to pick him up and get there, you only have your bonus action right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I take one of the tiny little healing potions, the regular-ass ones?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So there you go. You take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2d4 plus two. Ends Grog's turn. Taryon. Make a death saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's one good one. You get a success.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us up to the top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That's a dexterity saving throw from you, Grog. It's just all-out shocking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. That is 14 points of lightning damage to you, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Automatic death fail. All right, that brings us now to Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am just going to lean out the fucking door and take three attacks at a tentacle and run back in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, currently there is no tentacle in your range.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no tentacle in the range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, the tentacle's in range when it's wrapped around somebody, you can hit it right there. Right now, it's just in the distance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In that case, I'm going to run out, grab and help drag everybody through the portal if I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can grab and pull Taryon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You won't know for a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull Taryon through, his unconscious body through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm-- healing potion. I've got a minor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do. I've got a minor left that I haven't burned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and 2d4 plus two to Taryon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now, I'm standing at the portal ready to, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It is now the kraken's turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the one tentacle, all these broken tentacles that are trying to extend. You can see parts of it are regenerating and starting to extend a little bit. Not fully, but it's going to take a while for it-- but you can see it does regenerate over time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a bad, bad creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what, at the end of Percival's turn, it's going to use one of its legendary actions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know what that means.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that is 17 points of bludgeoning damage against you, reduced to half.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be nine, yeah. And, you are grappled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's going to try to swallow him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it is going to attempt to bite attack you. It does not have advantage. That is a 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 18 points of piercing damage, reduced to nine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you get any attacks, Groggy? Mm-hm? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Grog, it's your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's 20 points of damage on the first one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 26 is the hit for the second one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 24 points of damage on the second one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With 19 points of damage on the third one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It fails, and vomits you out again to the front of it! Jesus Christ!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right through the door! Vomits him right through the door!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, through the door! He projectile vomits!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to take a picture of that so people--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- are like, "That's a little too close."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the rest of my movement, can I turn around and look at him and go, yo, O Ancient One, can you read my mind now? And I walk through the portal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you do as you step away through the portal. (laughs) I can't believe that shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just tweeted that final saving throw on his end. Wow!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hand you my glasses and fall down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we're going to end tonight's game. Jesus Christ! Jesus Christ!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't fuck with the titan creatures, man! Hey, your first death, Vax!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First death? He's dead! That's not good!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know. We don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And if so, that's at the bailiwick of your Queen. But we'll find out where that brings us next week. One way or another, a climactic end to the Aramente.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And all of the guilt complexes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. I underestimated that whole thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was so much worse than I ever thought it would be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like I'm going to throw up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I feel a little nauseous, and it's not just the kraken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Loot Crate, for being our sponsor!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thanks, Loot Crate, for the robot and the Legos.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's still alive? All of us, but Vax and Taryon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many points did you have at the end there, Grog?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! I was watching him take it down, and I was like, oh my god, one more hit and Grog's unconscious!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I didn't get barfed, we would have problems.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to make a running, yeah. I was not willing to, yeah. I was not going to walk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You would have been swallowed, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm really glad I didn't have to go with that bad thought.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I guess Tary lives another day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've learned a lesson! Always carry an insurance policy with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, guys, well done! You got the lodestones and escaped with the body of Vax, though dead. Had that last death saving throw happened in the stomach of the kraken, there was no way you were getting back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, in a way, we won!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a silver lining. Anyway, guys, thank you for sticking through a very long, climactic, intense battle, both players and viewers. Thank you, Lootcrate, for being our awesome sponsor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Much love to you all, and is it Thursday yet?
